Instructions and construction sheets for a Pit of a Pendulum trap
Flying anvils
Maps
Tables
Traps
Puzzles
Challenges

85292.name: Dragon Wars
85292.description:
The ancient Dragons of the Black Mountains once claimed that they controlled all their eyes could see. The valleys and plains that stretched out from the foot fo their lofty eerie was their hunting ground and they commanded that special type of respect that only abject terror generates from all who lived beneath their dark shadow.

Dragon Wars is a tongue-in-cheek miniatures game featuring Halflings and Dragons in a battle for survival! This fully self-contained game contains over eighty 15mm pieces which consists of: 60 Halflings, 2 Dwarf Cannons and crew, 4 Undead Dragons, 8 Dragons, 3 Halfling houses as well as the rules you need for the game. If you like your games simple and silly, then this is for you!

85293.name: Hudson Hawk
85293.description:
User Summary

Hudson Hawk is a side-scrolling video game based on the 1991 action movie of the same name. The player controls Hudson Hawk as he sneaks into several high-security areas, including the Vatican and the Castle Da Vinci, in order to steal important artifacts.

85294.name: Dead Space: Extraction

videogamehonor.30859: 2009 Gamescom Best Nintendo Console Game of the Year Nominee

85294.description:
Dead Space: Extraction is a prequel to the video game Dead Space. Dead Space: Extraction takes place before the events of Dead Space. It revolves around a group of space colonists from the Aegis VII colony fighting against the infection of Necromorphs created when the Red Marker is removed. Necromorphs are the re-animated, mutated corpses of dead humans and serve as the major antagonists of the game.

Extraction is a first-person rail shooter introducing new enemies, characters, weapons and environments to the Dead Space series. Players also have some degree of control over the camera.

Source: Wikipedia, "Dead Space: Extraction", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

85295.name: MANIA!
85295.description:
Description from www.revision-games.com:

MANIA! includes several different games, which can be played either separately as a single game, or why not even all of them in the order presented below. The games are quick to play and easy to learn.

MANIA! is well suited for a warm up-game to start a gaming night, to get everyone on a party mood or to lift the spirit between longer gaming sessions. MANIA! is fun for the whole evening for casual party players and for serious strategists as well.

Game includes:
220 cards
rulebook (in English and in Finnish)

Rulebook includes following rules:

KleptoMANIA!
Steal the stacks of cards from your friends using the special attributes on the cards. The stacks grow larger as the game advances and the player with the largest loot wins.

PyroMANIA!
Construct six buildings and burn down the other players' houses before they reach the goal. Red and yellow cards represent fire, blue cards extinguishing and green cards buildings.

NymphoMANIA!
Help the male characters conquer the only female in the game. The player with the finest catch wins. It's the time for pickup-lines from the heavens or to sabotage the chances of other men.

BusinessMANIA!
Manipulate the stock value of the character's companies and buy the best shares for yourself. The stock market can surprise you and the share value of an unwary player can crash.

MemoryMANIA!
A classic with a manic twist. This game is suitable for all players, regardless of age or gaming experience.

CartoMANIA!
Chart the grid made of the cards. The best areas go to the player with the most tactical play, but the player with the most valuable treasure will finish strong.

HyperMANIA!
Get rid of your hand as soon as possible. In this game, you will be able to play multiple cards in a row, but be careful not to trap yourself.

---

MANIA! is the sum of many small games. The same cards work as the basis for a variety of games. MANIA! is suitable for both party players and for those who have been gaming for longer. These fast-paced and easy games have been sharply seasoned with special cards and humor.

85296.name: Cold War
85296.description:
User summary:

You play the role of Matt Carter, a freelance journalist. You are in the Soviet Union, chasing a story that will win you the Pulitzer prize... or so you think. You soon find yourself in Lubyanka, KGB’s political prison, stripped of all possessions and beaten to unconsciousness. You will soon be killed or sent to a Siberian prison.

Time is extremely important. Using some impoverished gadgets, a few recovered weapons and together with the help of a loyalist named Grushkov who has also been framed, you must try to escape. You must evade or overcome elite Soviet forces, defeat the conspiracy and prove that you are innocent, before all is lost.

85297.name: Shaun White Snowboarding: Road Trip

videogamefranchise.11430: Nintendo Selects (Best Selling Wii Games, US & EU)

85297.description:
User Summary

Shaun White Snowboarding: Road Trip is a snowboarding simulation game. The storyline revolves around a group of snowboarders traveling the world in search of the best rides.

85298.name: The Grim Reaper
85298.description:
From the publisher:

The Grim Reaper, Thanatos - there are many names for the personification of death. Typically appearing in a black robe and wielding a scythe, the Grim Reaper's job is to escort the souls of the deceased to the afterlife, where it hands them over to Charon for passage across the river Styx. However, the black robe and scythe are not its only appearance - it is believed that the Grim Reaper looks like whatever the viewer expects it to.

85299.name: Thor
85299.description:
From the publisher:

Thor, the god of thunder and lightning, strength and destruction, is a mighty god. The son of Odin, Thor wields the mighty mountain-crushing hammer, Mjolnir, wears the belt Megingjoro which doubles his godly strength, and the iron gloves Jarngreipr. A fierce-eyed, red-haired and red-bearded mountain of a man, Thor's strength and fury in battle know no equal.

85300.name: Lancelot
85300.description:
From the publisher:
Sir Lancelot, or Launcelot-du-Lac, was the pre-eminent knight of King Arthur's Round Table. A warrior without peer, he was held to be the greatest of Arthur's knights.

85301.name: Achilles
85301.description:
From the publisher:

Achilles was the greatest hero of the Trojan War. Fleet of foot, and strong in body, and godlike in battle, legend has it that he was invulnerable, a gift from his mother, the nymph Thetis; however he was finally slain in the closing battle of the war by a poisoned arrow.

85302.name: Dracula
85302.description:
From the publisher:

Count Dracula is the archetypical vampire, an ancient evil from Transylvania; many say that he is the first vampire, and legend has it that he is the 15th century Wallachian Prince, Vlad II the Impaler. Centuries old, Dracula's home is an ancient castle in the Carpathian Mountains.

85303.name: Robin Hood
85303.description:
From the publisher:

Robin Hood is the most famous bowman in legend; leader of a band of outlaws known as the "Merry Men", Robin is famed for robbing from the rich and giving to the poor. Originally an aristocrat, Robin of Locksley, Robin was dispossessed by his arch-enemy, the Sheriff of Nottingham and made outlaw when he rescued Much the Miller's son from the Sheriff's men. He quickly took up residence in nearby Sherwood Forest and recruited a band of outlaws, including Little John, Friar Tuck, Wil Scarlett, and others.

85304.name: David Crane's Amazing Tennis
85304.description:
David Crane's Amazing Tennis is a tennis simulation video game developed and published by Absolute Entertainment for the Super Nintendo and Mega Drive consoles in 1992. The game was also made available for the Nintendo Super System.
David Crane's Amazing Tennis simulates the mens singles game across three set matches, the game is viewed from behind the player. Clay, grass and hard courts are available, and the player can specify handedness. There are a selection of fictional computer controlled opponents available, each with different strengths, and a two player local multiplayer option is available. Players can perform various shots, such as topspin, backspin, lob and drop shots.

Source: Wikipedia, "David Crane's Amazing Tennis", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

85305.name: Evolutionens barn
85305.description:
User summary
Rule book containing the complete rules for Evolutions barn, a story based SciFi RPG set in a metropolis ruled by a company SigmaTec. The players are parts of a special task force set to preserve the status quo between the groups in the metropolis.

85306.name: Blumengarten
85306.description:
An action game out of the family Embuscades!

6 coloured balls should be placed in holes by a spinning top.
Under the lucent platter are the colours of petals. For each ball of the same colour than the petal below, the player will get a small card with a correspondent flower on it.

Goal is, to collect a complete flowerbed with 5 flowers of the colours red, blue, gree, yellow, and white each. The game was originally released as Karussell, which did not have a flower theme.

85307.name: Domination: Massive Assault Like Never Before
85307.description:
From the box of the game:

Prepare yourself for a strategy game of complete and utter domination as you take command of powerful combat legions in an all-out war for global supremacy. Battle across gigantic planets, mobilizing your land, sea and air units, in an attempt to overthrow your enemies' forces once and for all.

There are many pathways to victory. Each time you battle for planetary domination, you will need to mobilize your forces in unique and cunning ways. Battles never play out the same way twice. Conquer each planet one battle at a time, overcoming your opponent as well as harsh and challenging terrain. Utilize different environments to your advantage as you battle over land and sea, in the air and in space

> 8 planets to battle across for more than 200 hours of gameplay!

> Engaging single player game modes including: Scenario, Campaign, World War, Assault and Career.

> Challenging multiplayer modes including Hot Seat, Internet and LAN play.

> All unit movement, firing and explosions are vividly animated using 3D graphics and sound.

> Highly addictive gameplay - Easy to learn, difficult to master

> Intuitive training missions that help the novice strategy gamer to be up and "dominating" in no time!

85308.name: Emergency Fire Response
85308.description:
From the back of the package:

Take control of a squad of specialized firefighters, immersed in a blazing inferno! You will have to make all the right decisions and manage your men and equipment carefully, fighting flames and overcoming obstacles, using the best high performance vehicles available to real-world firefighters.

> 34 amazing missions set in 10 different environments, including a forest, a foreign embassy and a nuclear facility.

> Take command of a team of firefighters and fire specialists, trained to face all kinds of emergencies. Control high performance vehicles such as pumpers, rescue ladder and tankers.

> Game designed in collaboration with an international fire consultant.

> A tense and captivating atmosphere in which tension builds up constantly.

> Unexpected obstacles and events will slow down the player's progression.

> Dynamic fire propagation system and a full 3D engine.

85309.name: Hero System: Bloodsucker Rampage
85309.description:
Publisher Blurb:

In fiction and folklore, few monsters are as popular as the vampire. No matter what the time and place, it seems you can find a legend or story of a blood-drinking monster that preys upon mortal men by night. Bloodsucker Rampage is a review of some of the different types of vampires and vampire-like monsters found around the world. For the HERO System 6th Edition.

85310.name: Asgard (Issue 2 - Aug 2001)
85310.description:
Issue 2 of Asgard Magazine

Cover Art by J Ryan Machan

85311.name: Power-Up!
85311.description:
Designer:
"A game of side-scrolling, world-building, enemy-stomping action."

Power-Up! is a multiplayer board game that recreates the experience of playing a classic, side-scrolling video game with/against your friends, but with the added twist of constructing the game as you play it.

During the game, players clamor through a series of obstacles while gathering cash and placing tiles that represent yet more obstacles on the horizon in front of them. Turn order is constantly shifting, and the 5 choosable powers give the players the flexibility and edge they need to win.

85312.description:
Tactical board game for 2 players, participants play the roles of the eponymous kingpins – mafia bosses. The objective of the game is to defeat the enemy mafia, led by the opponent. Three important features of the game are: a two-sided game board featuring two different maps, three victory conditions available for the players, and the lack of randomness during play.

After one year Kingpin once more hits the city. The Colombian Cartel gringos roam the streets... 8 new tiles give you new countless tactics and expand the gameplay for many hours.

The first expansion for Kingpin published at Spiel'10.
85312.name: Kingpin: Colombian Cartel

85317.name: Asgard (Issue 3 - Oct 2001)
85317.description:
Issue 3 of Asgard Magazine

Cover Art by J Ryan Machan

85318.name: Galaxy on Fire 2
85318.description:
User Summary

Galaxy on Fire 2 is the sequel to the iPhone game Galaxy on Fire. The basic gameplay is the same: you are Keith Maxwell, gun for hire. The core of the game is 3d combat-based missions, whether your goal is to destroy all the pirates in a system, escort a convoy, or ferry a celebrity to their destination. But a mysterious and dangerous foe has appeared, and they are using wormhole technology to raid unsuspecting systems.

As you explore the galaxy doing missions for various factions, you can sell the cargo looted from your unfortunate targets on the open market to upgrade your ship and weapons. There are more ship and weapon varieties to choose from than in Galaxy on Fire. Graphics are improved, and 3D sound with English voiceovers is included. But the biggest change is the storyline: instead of taking a back seat as an introduction/tutorial to the gameplay, the storyline in Galaxy on Fire 2 is more extensive.

85319.name: Lotus Turbo Challenge 2
85319.description:
The second Lotus game shifted focus to arcade-oriented gameplay. Being the first of the series released for a game console (for Sega Mega Drive under the title Lotus Turbo Challenge), the fuel limit and difficulty levels were dropped, and the lap-based levels were replaced with course-based time trials, (not unlike arcade games such as Out Run), with the player required to complete each course within a specified time to qualify for the next one.

In addition to the Esprit Turbo SE, Lotus Turbo Challenge 2 also featured the Lotus Elan SE, hence 'Esprit' being dropped from the title. There was no choice of car however; it varied depending on the scenery of the level (the hard-top Esprit was used for the snow and thunderstorm levels, for example, while the Elan SE appeared in the desert and forest levels).

In an improvement over its predecessor, Lotus 2's single-player mode used all of the game screen instead of half, and opponent cars appeared in a variety of colors (opponent cars in the original game were all white). However, music was absent from racing altogether; the player instead hears the car's engine sound.

Lotus 2 was developed for the Amiga and then converted for the other platforms. It was considered as a technically most impressing game in its own genre. The Mega Drive port lacked the smoothly running graphics of the original version.

Source: Wikipedia, "Lotus (series)", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

85320.name: Antaire: Dungeons
85320.description:
Explore the hidden dungeons of the land of Antaire. Fight your way through the dungeon, avoiding its traps, fighting monsters and most importantly collecting your gold.

Antaire: Dungeons is a competitive dungeon exploration game. Players compete against the dungeon and each other, trying to leave with the most gold.

The game is designed to allow infinite replay. All players start with one of eight characters (Knight, Barbarian, Archer, Thief, Mage, Healer, Druid, Necromancer) on a beginning tile. As the game progresses the dungeon is extended by adding tiles consisting of corridors, rooms, and importantly shops and most importantly the exit tile. Shops allow the player to buy new equipment for their character, increasing his or her abilities, or heal damage from the dangers of the dungeon. Players themselves add monsters, traps and treasure within the dungeon to either their advantage or opponents disadvantage, leaving everybody to play. Death in the game is only final if the exit appears, extending the overall player interaction to the last possible moment. And don't worry, if a character exits the dungeon, the player may still play, using the dungeon and its inhabitants to stop other players exiting and defeating them.

85321.name: Full Speed Ahead!
85321.description:
Set during the Golden Age of Sail, players each take command of a nation state colonizing a group of unexplored islands. The goal of the game is to build the most productive empire through conquest, trading, and economic development.

A fully reconfigurable board ensures that every game plays completely differently, and scales up to make room for additional players. A three-tier tech tree creates an enormous amount of strategic depth. An innovative turn system allows players to trade off resources for extra moves. Fast-paced play keeps everybody playing and guessing until the winning empire is crowned!

85322.name: Hellam
85322.description:
Can you close the Seven Gates of Hellam Township before all Hell breaks loose?
Evil has broken the Hellstone seal and managed to push it up to the 4th gate. As the current Gatekeeper of the Paladins of Penn York your duty is to stop the relentless advance of Evil and attempt to push the Hellstone back to the Seventh Gate.

Hellam's theme is based on the legend of “The Seven Gates of Hell” that purportedly exist in Hellam Township, Pennsylvania.
Hellam is a fast playing, solo or two player game with a push your luck element. The person playing the Gatekeeper rolls dice in an attempt to close and seal the Seventh Gate while the Evil player pushes back on the stone in an attempt to break open the First Gate and flood our world with darkness.

85323.name: NBA Jam

videogamehonor.31572: 2010 Game Critics Best Sports Game of the Year Winner

85323.description:
This new version of the classic game, NBA Jam, is split up into two modes, a classic mode which plays like a traditional NBA Jam experience, and a Remix Tour which features all new camera angles, power-ups, and boss battles. Players are able to choose between Wii Remote, Wii Remote and Nunchuck, Classic Controller, and Classic Controller Pro control styles. Online play is not supported.

At the end of the game players will have to battle NBA legends Larry Bird and Earvin "Magic" Johnson. The game also features more than 30 other legends including: Manute Bol, Clyde Drexler, Kevin McHale, Hakeem Olajuwon, Scottie Pippen, Dennis Rodman, Detlef Schrempf, Spud Webb, James Worthy and Julius Erving.

In the game, the bodies take on a 3D look, while their heads take on a 2D look, which gave out real digitized likenesses. The game retains its usual exaggerated nature of play - players jumped many times above their own height, making slam dunks that defied both human capabilities and the laws of physics. There were no fouls, free throws, or violations except goaltending and 24 second violations. This meant the player was able to freely shove or elbow his opponent out of the way. Additionally, the game had an "on fire" feature, where if one player made three baskets in a row, he would become "on fire" and have unlimited turbo, no goaltending, and increased shooting ability, until the other team scored (or the player had scored four consecutive baskets while "on fire").

Some new features are in NBA Jam include campaign, which has 1-on-1 boss battles, elimination, which includes up to four different players where the player with the lowest amount of points being the loser, 21, which is a 1-on-1 match in where the first one to get 21 points is the winner, and HORSE, where up to four players shoot where the leader shot from, and if they miss, they get a letter.

The game is filled with easter eggs, special features and players activated by initials or button/joystick combinations. For example, players can enter special codes to unlock hidden players. Some characters could only be unlocked by requiring certain challenges to unlock hidden players.

Source: Wikipedia, "NBA Jam (2010 video game)", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

85324.name: WWE Day of Reckoning
85324.description:
Back of Case

The story mode that turns a rookie's dream into a superstar's reality!

School of Hard Knocks. Take your created Superstar up the ranks in a completely original story mode that starts you at the "minor leagues" of sports entertainment, to WWE Velocity & Heat and all the way to the big-time of WWE programming.


New Superstar Momentum Shift. Turn the tables on your opponent when they least expect it!
WWE Legends!
Bra & Panties

boardgamehonor.18764: 2012 Gra Roku Game of the Year Nominee

85325.description:
Get in a queue with your family in front of a store and experience a rush of genuine emotions!

The board game Kolejka (a.k.a. Queue) tells a story of everyday life in Poland at the tail-end of the Communist era. The players' task appears to be simple: They have to send their family members out to various stores on the game board to buy all the items on their shopping list. The problem is, however, that the shelves in the five neighborhood stores are empty.

The players line up their pawns in front of the shops without knowing which shop will have a delivery. Tension mounts as the product delivery cards are uncovered and it turns out that there will be enough product cards only for the lucky few standing closest to the door of a store. Since everyone wants to be first, the queue starts to push up against the door. To get ahead, the people in the queue use a range of queuing cards, such as "Mother carrying small child", "This is not your place, sir", or "Under-the-counter goods". But they have to watch out for "Closed for stocktaking", "Delivery error", and for the black pawns – the speculators – standing in the queue. Only those players who make the best use of the queuing cards in their hand will come home with full shopping bags.

On the product cards are photos of sixty original objects from the Communist era. The merchandise includes Relaks shoes, Przemysławka eau de cologne, and Popularna tea, as well as other commodities that were once in scarce supply. The neighborhood also has an outdoor market but the prices there are steep – unless, of course, you manage to strike a deal with the market trader. In this realistic game you really have to be savvy to get the goods.

Are you brave enough to confront the everyday life of the 1980s?
85325.name: Kolejka

85326.description:
Pamięć `39 (Memory ’39)

Get to know the history of Poland’s 1939 war of defense!

Everyone is familiar with memory games. With their simple rules and the excitement of rivalry, memory games appeal to both children and adults, and older players do not necessarily have an advantage over younger ones. Ever since they first appeared in the 1950s, games that involve looking for pairs of identical objects have enjoyed unflagging popularity and thousands of versions have been produced. While Memory ’39 continues this long tradition, it also introduces a certain element of novelty.
Designed by the Institute of National Remembrance, this game not only improves the players’ power of concentration but also helps them to memorize the events of 1939 that are so important for Polish national identity. Memory ’39 makes use of archival photographs illustrating Poland’s 1939 war of defense. A historical commentary on each photograph is provided in the enclosed brochure. Together with the commentary, the photographs tell a short history of the September campaign. To make the distant events more vivid, the black-and-white photographs have been tinted with great attention to historical detail.

The box contains:
– 48 game cards with archival photographs
– a brochure with historical commentaries on the photographs

(From back cover)
85326.name: Pamieć `39

85327.name: WWE WrestleMania XIX

videogamehonor.30929: 2003 Spike Best Fighting Game of the Year Nominee

85327.description:
Back of Case

Where Superstars become Legends


Realistic superstar attributes
New story mode with 25 missions
Sabotage Vince's Empire outside the ring
Robust gameplay with strong and weak grapples

85328.name: Dungeon Floor Plans 4
85328.description:
From the back of the box:

Dungeon Floor Plans 4 are an extension of the Dungeon Floor Plans role-playing game aid for use with 25mm miniature figures, and provide flooring, walls, features and accessories for adventures set in Caverns & Mines.

Contents
12 coloured [sic] sheets of card as follows:

Five sheets representing rocky Cavern Flooring
Three sheets representing Tunnel and Cavern Walls
Two sheets of Junction, Openings, and Corners
One sheet representing natural Cavern Features
One sheet of Mine Rails, Junctions and accessories

85329.name: Bass Class
85329.description:
User Summary

from the title screen:
Bass Class
The basics of bass fishing, by Dick Olsen
If you enjoy bass class, please register your copy by sending $15 (US) to the author:
Richard Olsen
68 Hartwell ave
Littleton, MA 01460

This is not a major firm production, but a small endeavour by some people knowledgable about bass fishing and computer coding.

It's a bass fishing simulation with six different locations, 6 different rods and 2300 different lure combinations. View is top down. Before even touching his fishing rod, the player has to decide how to get his boat to the perfect spot: using an outboard motor, trolling motor or paddling. Inshort: this will teach you a lot about bass fishing.

85330.name: Suveh Nux
85330.description:
From the developer:

“Yes, master?”

You rush to your master’s side and await his instructions. He is studying a fragile looking scroll and muttering to himself.

He looks up and says, “Ah, there you are. This ...” -- he hands you the scroll -- “... goes back in the vault. I believe it is still open. And this little beastie ...” -- he hands you a small, empty brass cage -- “... goes back to my private quarters. Thank you, that will be all.”

You bow, and head downstairs to the vault. The heavy stone door is wide open, and a golden key juts out of the lock.

Without warning, someone shoves you roughly from behind. The scroll and the brass cage fly out of your hands as you fall to the ground. There is a loud “click”, and everything turns black.

Suveh Nux is a game of magical experimentation, written for the 2007 One Room Game Competition. It came first place out of nine games, and also received an Xyzzy award for Best Puzzles.

85331.name: OddBlob
85331.description:
Source: The Developer Website.

Meet OddBlob: the groovy clay dude who loves to bounce! Help OddBlob bound across the squishy maze to grab bonuses, chomp fruit, and win points as quickly as he can as the chasing tiles disappear behind. Watch out for bounce and double bounce tiles that can help you reach your goal or throw you through the gaps to impending peril below! Cake slices earn you a try at the cake or doom mini-puzzle, the more bounces you make to get the cake, the bigger the bonus!

149342.name: Palacio de Viana: Las llaves de palacio

85332.description:
Cordoba, end of the 19th century. The marquis of the Palace of Viana has entrusted you with the decoration of the palace’s 12 courtyards and the great garden. Come May, all the courtyards will flourish in an explosion of color and aroma as their fountains babble under Cordoba’s luminous sunshine. With the help of some of the palace’s inhabitants you will place the best flowerpots in each courtyard filling each of their charming corners with flowers.

Palace of Viana is an entertaining strategy board game for everyone. While all the players assist in the Palace’s decoration, only the player with the most points shall be the winner. Plan your strategy, choose the characters that will help you, and enjoy playing in the courtyards of the Palace of Viana.

Game by Jesús Torres Castro
Illustrations by Raúl Cáceres, Raúlo
Graphic Design by SrBird (www.srbird.com)
Production by Games & Co

Córdoba, finales del siglo XIX. Los marqueses del Palacio de Viana te han encargado decorar sus 12 patios y su gran jardín. Con la llegada del mes de Mayo, todos los patios lucirán llenos de flores en una explosión de color y aromas, con el murmullo del agua en sus fuentes bajo el luminoso sol cordobés. Gracias a la ayuda de los diferentes personajes que habitan en el Palacio de Viana, debes colocar las mejores macetas en cada patio y llenar de flores cada uno de sus encantadores rincones.
Palacio de Viana es un divertido juego de mesa de estrategia para todos los públicos. Cada persona en la partida ayuda a decorar el Palacio de Viana pero sólo ganará quien obtenga la mayor cantidad de puntos con su trabajo. Planea tu táctica, elige los personajes que te ayudarán en cada momento y disfruta jugando en los patios cordobeses del Palacio de Viana.

Un juego de Jesús Torres Castro
Ilustraciones: Raúl Cáceres, Raúlo
Diseño Gráfico: SrBird (www.srbird.com)
Producción: Games & Co
85332.name: Palacio de Viana

85333.name: NinJump
85333.description:
User Summary

In this game you play a ninja, running up the walls of buildings. You will be scaling either side of the screen, while tapping to make your ninja jumpg from one side of the screen to the other. When he jumps, he's swinging his sword, attacking anything in his path. If you attack three of the same things in a row, you get powered up and soar even higher.

85334.name: Su-27 Flanker
85334.description:
User Summary

This game, developed by the Russian firm "Flying Legends" (which would later become the well known "Eagle Dynamics"), simulates the famous Russian fighter SU-27 Flanker. It's a hardcore sim focusing on the flying model. Nice touch (though some gamers might be put off by this) is that the cockpit is true to life and thus, all cockpit meters, dials and signs are in Russian. All the in-game text (like the menus and scenario editor) however are in english (or another language; like the German version is in German).

The game comes with a solid simple scenario builder. The action in the game is in the skies of Crimea (below Ukraine).

85335.name: Bandits at 3 O'Clock
85335.description:
User Summary

Bandits At 3 O'Clock is a WWII Flight Sim game.

Players control a small plane with a joystick and attempt to shoot the other plane down, avoiding obstacles such as flak and ground to air fire.

There are various levels of difficulty and slightly different terrain, but they all take place on one screen - the planes fly out of one side and into the other.

85336.name: Su-27 Flanker Mission Disk
85336.description:
User Summary

Expansion for SU-27 Flanker, containing a patch to upgrade to version 1.5 and an additional 150 (!) missions. New also is the network multiplayer option for up to 16 players.

85337.name: Dunn-Kempf Battle Guide to Simulation
85337.description:
User summary:

A modern warfare wargame, intended to be used with 1/285 miniatures and terrain tiles, developed and adopted as a training tool by US Army from 1977 to 1997.

The scale is one inch to 50 meters. A curtain is suspended half way down the playing area to simulate fog of war, and can be moved forward or backward depending on the knowledge of the terrain of the opponents. The game is normally played with three of four players per side and an impartial controller. Opponent teams take alternate turns, going through a sequence involving, in that order, artillery fire requests, previously requested artillery fire resolution, direct fire, movement. Combat is resolved by dice rolls on probability tables. The game uses two six-sided dice of different colors, to generate numbers from 11 to 66.

85338.name: Antigua
85338.description:
Antigua in the year 1717: It is rumoured that the wild pirate Black Sam has hidden all the gold he captured when boarding the Whydah on the "islands in the wind." Only two men survived when the ship afterwards ran aground on a reef near Cape Cod. Black Sam took the map with him to his watery grave – but perhaps the surviving navigator can help to find the treasure by locating the exact position of the islands. Is Antigua one of them?

GAMEPLAY:
Players start with a ship and its crew. Each player during his/er turn uses the actions provided by the crewmen of the ship. Each player may have a maximum of 4 crewmen. Each crewman has an action that may change during the game, thanks to the officer mechanism. A player, by using the officer, may
change the crewmen available actions and thus change the gameplay for all players.
The purpose of the game is to discover islands with treasure (with the help of the crew's Navigator), or while traveling, clash with other players and steal their treasure.

CREW MEN:

Kanonier: one kanonier crewman draws a card from the crew deck and adds its attack to the battle with a +1 bonus. Two kanoniers add +2 bonus
Offizier: changes the crewmen actions and then is discarded from the ship's crew.
Navigator: reveals a sea card your ship is on. If it is an island, gain a crew card from the deck for its treasure value and then discard the Navigator.
Steuermann: one Steuermann moves your ship twice. Two move your ship three times.
Maat: one Maat hires two new crewmen. Two hires three new crewmen. (if you have more than 4 crewmen, you must discard down to four).




GAME END:
The game ends when the biggest part of the sea has been discovered (how big is this part varies, according to the number of players), or when a pre-defined number of battles has happened and the winner is the player with the most treasures.

85339.description:
User Summary:

A map based wargame, intended to be played by opposing teams and refereed by a team of umpires, developed and adopted by the US Army as a training tool for guerrilla and counter-guerrilla operations in a jungle or densely forested environment. Teams are in separated rooms, and assign orders to company or platoon sized units in 6-hours time increments. The umpires work out the eventual detections, contacts and battles resulting from the teams' orders. Several tables are provided for time periods expended on movement, and detection and contact probabilities based on the terrain. Combat is resolved on a combat result table, with percentages of inflicting casualties depending on combat odds ratio.
85339.name: Tacspiel: The American Army's War Game of the Vietnam War

85340.description:
The fantastic theme park Adlungland has been expanded for the past twenty years. Several investors work and plan the most extraordinary fairground rides and attractions in order to entice even more visitors. Whoever builds the most exciting attractions gets to become the new vice-president of the park and a new, spectacular plaza will be named after him.

Each card in the game represents an attraction. Players take turns placing cards to build the park, attempting to place them in such a way as to minimize the hazards they must take on (waiting time, maintenance, and fear) while maximizing the points for building in a particular location. The game ends once you've gone through the deck once.

Recommended for families and experienced players; strongly recommended for two players.
85340.name: Adlung Land

85341.name: Su-27 Flanker (Squadron Commander's Edition)
85341.description:
User Summary

This compilation encompasses the original 'Su-27 Flanker' game, it's expansion; the 'Mission Disk' with 150 additional missions and also a freeware random scenario generator.

The game is patched to 1.5, as per Mission Disk. The AI is better and there's a new strategic AWACS view.

85342.name: Flanker 2.0
85342.description:
User Summary

Put on the market as Flanker 2.0, this title is the 2.0 version of 'Su-27 Flanker'. However, this was not only marketed as a new game, the game itself underwent severe remodelling, including now both the Su-27 and the Su-33 (the navy version of the Su-27). Since the Su-27 is a pure air superiority fighter and the Su-33 is also used for ground attacks, this makes a pure air-to-air sim a new game about all-round fighter combat with both air-to-air fights as well as ground attack missions.
On top of that, the game now has 3D accelerated texture-mapped graphics, giving it an entirely new appearance.

Once again, the in-game menus and pop-ups are language dependant (so the French version is in French), but the cockpit itself is purely in Russian, as is it's real life counterpart. Players do have the option to switch the HUD (Heads-Up-Display) between Russian and the game language.

85343.name: En Alas del Peligro

rpg.7971: Tú Eres Quien Defiende a los Animales

85343.description:
From the Back of the Book:

Defiende a los animales y lucha contra la extinción del tigre de Bengala.

Durante muchos años la caza indiscriminada del tigre de Bengala ha diezmado la población de forma alarmante.

Tú perteneces a una organización que se dedica a proteger a las especies en peligro de extinción. De entre todas las misiones que la organización puede adjudicarte, la que más te atrae es la de realizar un reportaje fotográfico para ilustrar un informe que sensibilice a la opinión pública acerca de la grave situación en que se encuentra este animal.

Para llevar a cabo tu misión deberás viajar a la India, donde conocerás de cerca las costumbres de este exótico país, y te enfrentarás a los peligros que te deparará la selva.

¿Qué más ocurre en esta historia? Todo depende de tus elecciones. Para tomar las decisiones correctas y llevar a cabo tu misión, es necesario que descubras las pistas auténticas que se hallan ocultas en las ilustraciones en color. Para ello dispones de un filtro en la primera página del libro.


User Translation from Spanish:

Defend the animals and fight the extinction of the Bengal tiger.

For many years the indiscriminate hunting of the Bengal tiger has decimated the population at an alarming rate.

You belong to an organisation dedicated to protecting endangered species. Of all the missions that the organisation has claimed, the most appealing to you is to make a photographic reportage to illustrate a report to sensitise the public about the serious situation in which this animal finds itself.

To accomplish your mission you must go to India, where you will learn about the customs of this exotic country, and you will confront the dangers that lurk in the jungle.

What else happens in this story? It all depends on your choices. To make the right decisions and carry out your mission, it is necessary to discover the real clues that are hidden in the colour illustrations. To do this you have a filter in the front page of the book.

85344.name: La Desaparición de la Doctora Rinner

rpg.7971: Tú Eres Quien Defiende a los Animales

85344.description:
From the Back of the Book:

Defiende a los animales y protege a los gorilas de los cazadores furtivos.

Decides ir en busca de tu amiga, la doctora Rinner, que ha desaparecido en plena selva africana, mientras realizaba una investigación sobre el comportamiento de los gorilas.

Después de sortear todo tipo de dificultades, te dispones a seguir el rastro de los gorilas con la esperanza de descubrir su paradero.

¿Qué se oculta tras la desaparición de la doctora Rinner? ¿Cuál es la verdadera actividad de los comerciantes que te ayudan a llegar hasta el campamento?.

Tu misión consiste en encontrar a la doctora Rinner y evitar que los gorilas sean capturados.

¿Qué más ocurre en esta historia? Todo depende de tus elecciones. Para tomar las decisiones correctas y llevar a cabo tu misión, es necesario que descubras las pistas auténticas que se hallan ocultas en las ilustraciones en color. Para ello dispones de un filtro en la primera página del libro.


User Translation from Spanish:

Defend the animals and and protect the gorillas from poachers.

You decide to go in search of your friend, Dr. Rinner, who has disappeared in the jungle of Africa, while doing research on the behaviour of gorillas.

After sorting out all sorts of difficulties, you are about to follow the trail of gorillas in the hope of discovering his whereabouts.

What lies behind the disappearance of Dr. Rinner? What is the true activity of the merchants that help you reach the camp?

Your mission is to find Dr. Rinner and to prevent the capture of the gorillas.

What else happens in this story? It all depends on your choices. To make the right decisions and carry out your mission, it is necessary to discover the real clues that are hidden in the colour illustrations. To do this you have a filter in the front page of the book.

85345.name: Strategic Simulations: Commander's Collection
85345.description:
User Summary

Compilation box containing Silent Hunter II, Il-2 Sturmovik and Flanker 2.5

85346.name: Spot!
85346.description:
The cards show three circles or three squares in different sizes and colors. They are arranged either centrally or off-centre.

A SPOT occurs when you can form a pattern from exactly three cards in the same colour. Players try to find as many SPOTS as possible in order to collect the most cards.

85347.name: Comanche: Maximum Overkill
85347.description:
User Summary

The first of NovaLogic's Comanche series and the first game to use the Voxel engine, which was a technological landmark in rendering lifelike terrain and realistic objects, like adversaries, buildings, vehicles and the like.

The game features the Boeing/Sikorsky RAH-66 Comanche light attack helicopter. (The Comanche helicopter program was launched in 1983 by the US Army, but ultimately cancelled in 2004, so no Comanche has ever been in operational combat duty.)

The game leans more towards action/arcade than towards hardcore flightsim, as the helicopter can take massive amounts of damage while employing unrealistically accurate weapon systems.

Main gameplay is focused around the campaign, set in the war against drugs in 2002. It contains 20 missions.

85348.name: Black Sect
85348.description:
User Summary

Black Sect is a real-time adventure game where you've been tasked with saving the town of Hobdale from the dark plans of a strange cult. You have three days to stop them. NPCs in the town come and go at certain times and obstacles may only be solved if approached at the right moment. Black Sect has little dialogue and revolves more around the collection and use of items.

85349.name: Death Gate
85349.description:
Death Gate is an adventure game loosely based on Margaret Weis and Tracy Hickman's fantasy book series The Death Gate Cycle.

The player takes the role of Haplo and starts in the Nexus with Lord Xar. Lord Xar tasks Haplo to visit the four worlds, Arianus, Pryan, Abarrach and Chelestra and retrieve the seal pieces of these worlds. Xar plans to undo the Sundering with the Reformation, the act of recreating the Earth again and he needs the seal pieces to do so.

Source: Wikipedia, "Death Gate", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

85350.name: Comanche: Global Challenge
85350.description:
User summary

First add-on for Comanche: Maximum Overkill.

The expansion includes 3 new campaigns, each 10 missions long. New enemies are introduced like the Mi-24 Hind and Scuds. It also has new terrain to fight over: desert and arctic.

85351.name: Comanche: Over the Edge
85351.description:
User Summary

Second expansion of 'Comanche: Maximum Overkill', featuring another 40 missions equally divided over 4 new campaigns.

This expansion too features new terrains and new enemies. Besides that, the graphics engine has been updated.

Last but not least, the player can now select new options which increase difficulty, making the game less arcade-like and slightly more real flight-sim like.

85352.name: Comanche CD
85352.description:
User Summary

Compilation CD-ROM containing 'Comanche: Maximum Overkill' and both it's expansions ('Global Challenge' and 'Over The Edge') and an additional 10 bonus missios.

85353.name: Dark Seed II
85353.description:
Dark Seed II is a sequel to the adventure game Dark Seed. It features the further adventures of Mike Dawson in the "Dark World", based on the artwork of H. R. Giger and designed/written by future James Bond novelist Raymond Benson.

Mike Dawson saved the world from the 'Ancients' in Dark Seed, but the experience causes him to have a mental breakdown. In attempt to regain his sanity he returns to his childhood home town of Crowley, Texas, and moves in with his mother. A year goes by, and Mike is still suffering from serious mental problems and memory lapses. To make matters worse, his high school girlfriend, Rita, is found murdered after their high school reunion and everyone seems to believe that Mike is the murderer. It would seem that the 'Ancients' have returned, and in order for Mike to clear his name he must venture through different realities, solve puzzles and stop the Ancients from taking over the world.

Source: Wikipedia, "Dark Seed II", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

85354.name: Ben Jordan Case 1: In Search of the Skunk-Ape
85354.description:
Ben's first case finds him in the Florida Everglades, looking for something known as "The Skunk-Ape" which is said to be a local variation on Bigfoot. The Skunk-Ape got its name because of its horrible smell, described as a mixture of moldy cheese, rotten eggs, and dung.

Several park rangers have been murdered, and so Ben is called in to investigate the possibility that the Skunk-Ape is involved. Help him survive long enough to solve his first case!

Source: The Developer Website.

85355.name: Ben Jordan Case 2: The Lost Galleon of the Salton Sea
85355.description:
Ben is called out to the tiny desert town of Dunesberg, California, to investigate the disappearance of a local man who went out searching for the Lost Galleon, a Spanish treasure ship said to be located somewhere beneath the sands.

Source: The Developer Website.

85356.name: Ben Jordan Case 3: The Sorceress of Smailholm
85356.description:
The tiny village of Smailholm, Scotland has seen better days. Recently, two little girls have been murdered and the locals suspect the work of witches. In what may be his toughest case yet, Ben must figure out what happened to the children and discover if the witch rumors are true. However, this time he may end up in over his head...

Source: The Developer Website.

85357.name: Ben Jordan Case 4: Horror at Number 50
85357.description:
Ben's latest case finds him investigating the mysterious Number 50, Berkeley Square, London. The site of several ghost stories, infamous for its famous "horror," paranormal activity at Number 50 has been dormant for nearly 100 years. Until now...

Source: The Developer Website.

85358.name: Ben Jordan Case 5: Land of the Rising Dead
85358.description:
After the events in London, Ben Jordan returns home for a much needed rest. One day, he receives a conference call from his friends Simon Booth and Alice Wilkins. Simon has heard of a series of murders in Osaka, Japan, and thinks there is some sort of paranormal activity involved. Ben, Simon, and Alice travel to Japan, but soon find there is much more to the story than they first thought...

Source: The Developer Website.

85359.name: Ben Jordan Case 6: Scourge of the Sea People
85359.description:
Following Alice's near-fatal poisoning in Japan, the paranormal investigating trio decides a vacation is in order. Traveling to Greece, they find themselves in the remote fishing village of Agia Anna. However, they soon learn that even while on vacation their work is never done. It seems that ancient creatures of legend known as the Sea People have been emerging from the ocean at night and dragging villagers down to the depths to eat them. Ben, Simon, and Alice must investigate and put an end to the Scourge of the Sea People!

Source: The Developer Website.

85360.name: Ben Jordan Case 7: The Cardinal Sins
85360.description:
It's Christmas Eve in Rome. What should be a joyful occasion becomes a senseless tragedy as a priest is murdered in cold blood. Back home in Philadelphia, Ben Jordan receives a phone call from the man accused of the crime, begging him to go to Rome and clear his name. Seeing this as a chance to prove his career choice to his disapproving family, Ben calls up his friends and starts another investigation. However, Ben doesn't realize that this will be the toughest case he's ever had, as many questions will be answered, and some lives will be lost...

Source: The Developer Website.

85361.description:
It's a Saturday Night in The Club and lonely hearts are still looking for love. This time the heart riot under the strobe lights can truly take place as The Club has hired the best DJ in town to help people get into the "right" mood. Will the DJ's tracklist help you become the clairvoyant cupid who can join the right souls in order to keep The Club as the hottest place in town?

The DJ Set extends the basic The Club game, but it also comes with King & Queen of Clubs which is its own game using the same components as The Club. For the base game, there's also new stickers for tiles to ease the point scoring.
85361.name: The Club: DJ Set

85362.name: Der blaue Kristall
85362.description:
Das Blaue Kristall is a boardgame about solar power plants.

During the game, players acquire solar panels that they can use to build their own power plants, or to take part in the community power plants. On other playing fields, players will draw an action card. Some of these cards are question cards, which contain a question on the subject of solar energy.

Goal of the game is to produce and sell a pre-set amount of solar power.

85363.name: Troll Robot Arena
85363.description:
Five players take the rolls of Trolls - the deep thinkers.

With big brains, but large hands, only plans not robots can be formed. Thus they rely on Goblins and Igors to do their bidding.

Creating part after part in a cooperative way, always on the look out for a backstabbing move by a fellow play the game at first begins with worker placement and strategy.

In the second phase the players bet on the outcome of the third phase: the Battle phase!

Card directed combat with dice to boost!

To finish a round, the players can brag about the outcome and collect their healthy win of 'Shrooms.

Build. Bet. Battle. Booyah!

The game for the troll. A game for the euro gamer. A game for the AT fan.

Created for the "PnP Summer Contest - Confuse A GAMER!" Contest - held by Rudolf Aligierski.

85364.name: Strike Commander
85364.description:
From the Origin Product catalog:

In 2011, you command Stern's Wildcats, an elite squadron of mercenaries trying to fly straight in a world of deceit and violence. You'll pilot F-16s and an F-22 as you engage rival squadrons, third-world dictators and the armies of the dreaded IRS. Forty missions take you a step beyond Wing Commander and into a true 3-D world, both on the ground and in the air, for an intense, cinematic experience unlike any seen before. Visit the world at Mach 2 as you blast across city vistas, zip through canyons and race down river valleys in an authentic simulation full of the hottest dogfighting action ever seen on a PC.

85365.name: Resistance: Retribution

videogamehonor.31479: 2008 Game Critics Best Handheld Game of the Year Winner

85365.description:
User Summary

A third-person shooter set in the Resistance universe. The player takes control of a British agent who joins with the French resistance to help fight back the chimera invasion. Set after the events of Resistance: Fall of Man

85366.name: The Hilly Chronicles
85366.description:
The Hilly Chronicles is a collectible card game that will give you the chance to challenge your friends in epic absurd battles. Set in the world of Bunny Hilly where anything is possible, it is a great way to spend fun time with family and friends.

In The Hilly Chronicles players take on the role of a powerful rabbit and fight evil monsters for carrots by playing cards, using special powers and combining to form teams. With multiple game variations players can change the game difficulty to reach ever higher goals.

Game and rules are in Italian.

Italian:
The Hilly Chronicles è un gioco di carte collezionabili che ti darà la possibilità di sfidare i tuoi amici e compagni in epiche battaglie al limite dell'assurdo.

Ambientato nel mondo del Coniglietto Hilly dove tutto è possibile, questo gioco ti farà passare del tempo allegro insieme ai tuoi amici.

Impersonifica i vari personaggi Hilly e combatti per la conquista delle tue carote.

Con molteplici varianti di gioco è possibile cambiare la difficoltà di gioco per raggiungere obiettivi sempre più alti.

Cosa aspetti a provarlo?

Italian from the publisher http://www.thegamecrafter.com/games/the-hilly-chronicles

Includes:
Cards Deck (99 cards)
Regole del Gioco Document / Rules document
1 D6 (16mm) - Green
1 Plastic Bags - 3"x4"
60 Wink (7/8" | 22mm) - Orange
[English is my own translation, with details added for bgg]

85367.name: Bible Black
85367.description:
Source: [From the back of the box with special features listed].

Twelve Years ago, an innocent looking junior college Magic Club held a Satanic ritual. The helpless Kitami was chosen as a sacrifice, but she got her revenge by making a blood contract with the demon that was summoned. In present day, the love-struck Minase finds one of the clib's old books. He uses a forbidden spell to control the body of Shiraki, the most popular girl at school. When his magic goes out of control, however, none of the students are able to control their sexual instincts! Not only does this attract the girls of the new Magic Club, but also a mysterious school nurse who has been seducing female students.

Some special features of the game:

12 possible endings for the game.
28 different interactive sexual scenarios.
Original Japanese language with English subtitles.
Featuring an additional "Erotic Mode"
Ability to save scenes.




This is an adult-oriented adventure game.
The game features the original Japanese actors along with English Subtitles. This game is 100% uncensored and for Mature audiences only.

85368.name: echoshift
85368.description:
The game is an indirect sequel to Echochrome. The player controls a small stick-like figure who can walk, go up and down stairs, and press switches. The object of each level in the game is to move this stick figure from the entrance door to the exit door. There are multiple obstacles that the player must overcome to get to the exit door, including moving platforms, spiked blocks, and pressure sensitive bridges. The player is given a set amount of time to traverse the level, but each level is set up to be impossible to complete in just one playthrough. This is how time bounces come into play. Each time the player moves through the level a recording of their actions is created. When time bounces, the player plays through the same level again, but alongside the recording of what they did in the previous playthrough. This recording is known as an "echo" and appears as a shadow of the player. By cooperating with these echoes of the players past actions, the player can successfully get to the end of the level.

Source: Wikipedia, "Echoshift", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

Available as a download only in the United States, and on UMD in the UK and Japan.

85369.name: Sonic the Hedgehog 4 Episode I
85369.description:
The sequel fans have waited 16 years for is finally here: SONIC THE HEDGEHOG™ 4 Episode I!

Featuring enhanced gameplay elements, including the classic Sonic Spin Dash, and the versatile Homing Attack, Sonic 4 picks up right where Sonic and Knuckles™ left off.

With Eggman finally defeated, Sonic runs off to explore new zones and uncharted lands. Dr. Eggman, furious at the destruction of the Death Egg and the failure of his plans, puts all of his most devious schemes into action. In an effort to finally rid himself of Sonic, he revisits – and improves – the very best of his creations.

Get ready for the next chapter in an all new epic 2D saga built for old and new fans alike.

Source: The Publisher Website.

85370.name: Umläut: Game of Metal

rpghonor.13825: 2009 Indie RPG Awards - Best Production - Runner Up

85370.description:
Publisher Blurb:

Heavy Metal. The very name itself drips with power, testosterone and hairspray. Warriors on the stage of history, wielding their axes and mics as they do battle for glory!

Trusts are forged and betrayed, mighty empires rise and fall. Ultimately, the only truth worth living for is Metal.

Long of hair and tight of pants, you join the ranks of Metal in your quest for babes, booze and glory. Try to Make It Big and hunt down an elusive record contract.

These are the heroes of an age.

This is their story.

Umläut: Game of Metal is a competitive storytelling game which gives each player the chance to create and control of their own Heavy Metal band. Simple mechanics let you chart their career as they rehearse, play gigs, fight among themselves and pull crazy publicity stunts.

Will you make it big, or are your records destined to languish in the discount bin of obscurity? Can you hold your band together when the going is rough, or will you self destruct in a drug-fuelled clash of egos?

Find out, in... Umläut: Game of Metal!

85371.name: G.M. Magazine (Issue 10 - Jun 1989)

rpgissue.4032: G.M. - The Independent Fantasy Roleplaying Magazine

rpg.663: Judge Dredd the Role-Playing Game (Games Workshop)

85371.description:
Contents:

•News
•Doom
•The Dreamthief's Pledge - story by Michael Moorcock
•Books by Alan Crump
•Convention Corner
•The Light Fantastic by John Treadaway
•The Paint Shop
•Dicing with Dragons by Simon Letts
•GURPS - An overview of the Generic Universal Role Playing System
•Danger Children at Play?
•Invasion of the Mega-fax - A judge Dredd RPG sub-plot by Marcus L Rowlands
•PBM Update by Wayne
•Readers Short Story
•The Axeman Cometh!
•David Langford's Critical Hits

85372.name: Dork Tower (Issue 33)
85372.description:
Issue Name: Passion of the Ken
Comic Author: John Kovalic
Comic Artist: John Kovalic

Gaming Content: Slayer's Guide to Chicken for Kobolds Ate My Baby! (Super Deluxx Edition)
SGtC Authors: Chris O'Neill & Dan Landis
SGtC Artist: John Kovalic

User Description:
The Slayer's Guide to Chicken is an eight page center-insert in the issue; it can be pulled out, but has consistent numbering with the rest of the issue, and is on pages 17-24. It does not have separate coverstock, either.

85373.description: One of the first "pick up an deliver" games from the late '50s. As in Deutschlandreise the destination towns are drawn randomly. But in addition to that traveling game on a german map, goods have to be transported on the shortest or fastest way.
85373.name: Autobahnspiel

85374.name: Strands of Fate
85374.description:
From publisher blurb:

An aging gunslinger seated on his horse scans the town below...

The brash young pilot guns his craft through the asteroid field...

A professor scours the dusty book shelves for the ritual of summoning...

An assassin holds his breath as he gently squeezes the trigger...

Strands of Fate contains everything you need to tell stories of adventure, action, horror, and intrigue set in any genre. Whether it's classic fantasy, urban mystery, dashing super heroes, or far future action, this book is your guide. Strands utilizes the FATE roleplaying game system and provides the Game Master with all the tools he needs to get any campaign, of any genre or power level, off the ground and running in minutes.

Strands of Fate features:

Rules for creating and playing stories about average people, over the top heroes, or virtual gods.
A system of Advantages that provide you with fully functional magic, psionics, mutations, cybernetic enhancements, or any other strange power you can imagine.
Rules for creating and playing with vehicles, from pirate ships to star ships to ten story tall battle mechs.
Support for non-human races or even transhuman characters.
A system for creating and controlling units and organizations, and using them to play out regional or world spanning conflicts.
Antagonists and equipment to challenge and aid your characters, whether they're knights, modern soldiers, or star hopping androids.

85375.name: Toxifax
85375.description:
A complex simulation about raising industrialization and associated incremental pollution. The game is unbalanced: Goal of the "Toxifax"-player is, to pollute the other countries until the are bankrupt. The "country"-players try to clean their towns and finally confirm a test.

The game was produced by the former printing shop "Achilles" in Aachen on a very high quality level.
The pawns are ink bottle caps in different colors.
6 pages of rules were a high barrier at that time (not only for doctorates like Dr. Waldemar Lentz)

85377.name: Tuo La Ji
85377.description:
This game is known in Chinese as tuo la ji (拖拉机) (meaning 'tractor') or bashi fen (八十分) (meaning '80 points'). It is an expanded version of sishi fen ('40 points') using two or more decks, and is related to zhao pengyou ('looking for friends'). All these games are collectively known as Sheng1 Ji2 (升级), which means "raise level" or "promote". Tractor is widely popular in China, especially in Shanghai and south of the Yellow River where it has practically displaced the older single deck game.

The scores of the teams are expressed as card ranks. At the start of the game, each partnership has the lowest possible score, which is two. By winning games, a partnership can increase its score to a higher rank: three, four, five and so on. Above ten come jack, queen, king and ace. The objective is to achieve a score higher than ace - the partnership that achieves this wins the game.

In each hand, one team forms the declarers, sometimes known in Chinese as dang1 zhuang1 (当庄), and the other team forms the opponents. In the first hand, either team can be the declarers, depending on who makes trumps. In subsequent hands, the team that won the previous hand is the declarers, and the other team is the opponents.

One member of the declarers' team is the starter, who has the advantage of taking the last cards in the deal, discarding some cards, and leading the first trick. While the declarers try to increase their score, the opponents' objective is to take at least 80 card points, in which case they become the declarers for the next deal.

Source: edited from Pagat, http://www.pagat.com/kt5/tractor.html

85378.name: Asgard (Issue 4 - Nov 2001)
85378.description:
Issue 4 of Asgard Magazine

Cover Art by J Ryan Machan

85380.name: Hamlet
85380.description:
User Summary

Hamlet is an indie production point-and-click adventure game developed by mif2000. The game is a spin on Shakespeare’s Hamlet, and it follows a time travelling scientist that has been transported back to the time of Hamlet and his associates. The player controls the scientist once he arrives in the past, and must rescue Ophelia from Claudius. Hamlet was knocked out when the scientist teleported in, so he will be no help in the endeavor.

Gameplay is broken into a series of puzzles and brainteasers that can be solved using a point-and-click interface. These puzzles are strung together into a storyline, and once the player completes a puzzle they will be advanced to the next stage. There are 25 levels included in the game, and the brainteasers are primarily completed by clicking on stage items in the correct order. There is no inventory or dialogue in the game.

85381.name: Asgard (Issue 5 - Mar 2002)
85381.description:
Issue 5 of Asgard Magazine

Cover Art by Ryan Nock

85382.name: Joe & Mac
85382.description:
The game stars the green-haired Joe and the blue-haired Mac, cavemen who battle though numerous prehistoric levels using, weapons such as boomerangs, bones, fire, flints, electricity, stone wheels, and clubs. The objective of the game is simply rescuing a group of girls who were kidnapped by a rival tribe of cavemen. The gameplay is somewhat similar to Contra and has a Gauntlet-style health system, where the player loses health over a period of time apart from in boss battles. This health system is also not unlike that of Sega's Wonder Boy. The game could be played in either single player or two player mode. In the two player mode, both characters could hurt each other. The game was also notable for its cartoony graphics, humor, and sound effects.

The original arcade version had the distinction of allowing the player to select between different routes (not unlike Taito's Darius) at the end of a boss battle. Also, after defeating the final boss, the players can choose between three exits, each one leading to a slightly different ending sequence.

Source: Wikipedia, "Joe & Mac", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

85384.name: Asgard (Issue 6 - Jun 2002)
85384.description:
Issue 6 of Asgard Magazine

Cover Art by Tom Martin

85385.name: The Haunt
85385.description:
From the bottom of the box:

"Your cause is hopeless..."
The voice thunders around you after you crash into the wall.

"There is nowhere to hide..."
You reach for your weapon, and feel a mighty hand grip your arms. You look and see the hideous talons gripping you. But they're coming out of the walls themselves; there are no bodies attached.

"Leave this place now...
You pulse is pounding. You strain your muscles to reach for your dagger, Sweating and wheezing, you hope you have a chance to stop this thing, before it's too late.

...and save me the bother of killing you."

The Haunt Guidebook is a reference book detailing the beings, items, and other aspects of Stoker Manor. Legends claim that secrets and fortunes may be found within the confines of this once stately, two-story mansion, but none has returned to confirm these tales.

This boxed set contains: The Haunt Guidebook, the adventure, and a full color, three gate-fold GM's Screen containing pertinent tables, charts and the Manor's layout.

For 4-6 Players with Skill Levels of 12-17. This setting can be used in any fantasy role-playing system.

85386.name: The Raiders of Ironrock
85386.description:
From the back of the box:

"It's not fair..."
Fear cascades within you - chest burning, lungs straining. Running. Tripping. The forest tears at your clothes.

"...First time out...looking for some deadbeat dwarf..."
Your knees buckle, the strain taking its toll. Glancing back. Fearing pursuit. The sweat pours into your eyes, stinging.

"...patrol gets ambushed...and I'm running for my life...from a couple of orcs who make Phoebus look handsome...
From the bushes ahead come the unmistakable sounds of orcish footfalls. Suddenly, one stumbles into the clearing and spots you, grunting an alert to others nearby.

GREAT...no job is worth this..."

The Raiders of Ironrock is the first adventure in the Invincible Overlord campaign series. Deep within the Leopa Mountains, your adventurers must uncover and stop an evil plot to destroy the Overlord's Army. As patrolling scouts, you encounter the threat to Briarwood, and become part of the grand battle for control of Calandia.

For characters, Skill Levels 3 to 4.

This boxed set contains: The White Peaks District Guidebook, the Raiders of Ironrock adventure, a players map and a full-color poster sized map.

85387.name: Tombs & Terrors
85387.description:
Subtitle: Old School Fantasy Role Playing

Publisher Blurb:
Based on the rules first found in Go Fer Yer Gun! and seen later in Medieval Mysteries, Tombs & Terrors is an unashamedly familiar role playing game of delving into subterranean crypts and looting the treasure. Including 4 traditional character classes (Cleric, Fighter, Mage and Thief) plus 2 "exotic" ones (Barbarian and Troubadour), and 5 races (Dwarf, Elf, Giant-kin, Half-elf and Human), this game is condensed for simplicity but covers ground that you will understand. Compatible (with some tweaking) with sourcebooks and supplements that you already have, this rpg provides another welcome alternative for your fantasy needs!

85388.name: Golden Goal: Olympic Soccer
85388.description:
Following on the tradition of the TCS games dedicated to other olympic sports (Water polo, basketball,field and ice hockey), Golden goal is a fast and easy to play statistical replay game on Soccer, featuring all the Soccer tournaments, both male and female, from the early olympics onward.

Game is easy: both teams are rated for attack and defense, you compare the factors and roll a die to see how many goals each team scored. But there are random factors, incarnated by "third die", a random die roll that may have strong effects on the initial factors.
A tournament may be completed in less than an hour

85389.description:
In Vampire Werewolf Fairies you try to become four different types of people -- Vampires, Werewolves, Witches, and Fairies. The goal of the game is to collect objects to help you or hurt your opponents, and to become types that can use those objects. You can play as multiple types. At the end of the game, a fast-paced lightning round can make or break the winner.

This is a game for 2-6 players. Or, it can be combined with Zombie Ninja Pirates and played with up to 10 players.

There are 3 kinds of cards. Type cards give you points if you are that type at the end of the game. Action cards will allow you to play a quick action, such as become a Type (like the "Bite" card, which lets you become a Vampire), or remove a Type from another player (like "Hair Remover", to remove a Werewolf type). Finally, Object cards you want to try to collect, and will give you points if you are a type that can use that Object. For example, "Sparkles" are +3 points for Fairies, but -3 points for Vampires, because we all know that real Vampires *don't* sparkle.

Integrates with:

Zombie Ninja Pirates
85389.name: Vampire Werewolf Fairies

85390.name: Terrarium
85390.description:
A previously unknown immense cave system is discovered underneath Europe. It has been nicknamed "Terrarium" - in it animals have evolved into species unknown and strange to man. You are the head of a team of biologists set on an expedition to discover these new species within the caverns.

You discover the cave by laying out tiles. Within the caves you can discover pieces of information on the animals (Mammals, Reptilians, Birds, Fish, Insects). Then you must study and construct the animal at your base camp. In the end you will have discovered new species. The explorer who has discovered more and rarer animals will gain the most prestige and win the game.

85391.name: WWE Day of Reckoning 2
85391.description:
Back of Case

The line between friend and foe is not always clear. This time, TRUST NO ONE!

Features:


IMPROVED GRAPHICS: See the emotion on each WWE Superstar's face like never before and experience all-new "beyond broadcast" camera angles
NEW AND LONGER STORY MODE: Now a proven force in the WWE, take your created superstar on a continuing journey of deception and vindication
ENHANCED FIGHTING SYSTEM: Exclusive skill based submission system, all-new stamina system, improved Ai tactics and new assisted defense system allow for more realistic matches
NEW WWE LEGENDS: Hulk Hogan, "Stone Cold" Steve Austin, Mankind, Bret "The Hitman" Hart and The Rock

85392.name: Final Doom
85392.description:
From the collector edition

The final chapter in the legendary Doom series. This is it. The end. The end of the undead Marines, the acid-drenched hallways and hell-spawned hordes. Its 2 new, 32-level episodes (complete with new stories, The Plutonia Experiment and Evilution) let you finish what you started. Final Doom. End of story.

85393.name: Doom Collector's Edition
85393.description:
User Summary

From Id Software, the name in first-person action, comes the ultimate in explosive terror. Rip, Slice, and blast your way to freedom in the Doom hits that put put action on the map. Then, peer into the future of entertainment, with preview content from the most terrifying game ever created - DOOM 3.

boardgamehonor.21018: 2012 Spiel der Spiele Hit für Experten Recommended

85394.description:
The king is holding a great banquet for all the nobles in the realm so that they can bathe in his splendour. Artists and troubadours will bring the necessary entertainment. It is meant to be a feast that will long be remembered!

The guests attending the feast hall feel the same, for in the corners of the castle deadly plots are being developed. The guests are divided into two factions, with both planning to "dismiss" the king. One faction plans to smuggle a dagger into the feast hall to "open the king's heart to the realm" at the right time, while the other faction hopes to give the king "renewed motivation" with a poisoned drink.

In The Last Banquet, each player is a guest at the feast and needs to help his faction reach its goal and ensure that this will truly be the king's last banquet. The game includes 25 role cards, each portraying a person on the front and listing that person's skills on the back. In addition to "The Last Banquet", several other scenarios are provided in the rules that can be played with each of the roles. (GameHeads' Oliver Wolf notes, "Playing time ranges from 30 minutes up to 90 minutes or more, with more people tending to need more time to play." Also, some scenarios involve more than two factions.) Obstacle cards provide challenges for players to overcome.

When a faction succeeds in its goal, all players who belong to that faction win the game.
85394.name: The Last Banquet

85395.name: Comanche 2
85395.description:
User Summary

Sequel to the succesful Comanche game, about the light attack helicopter of the US Army that in reality never flew (project was abandoned).

The game features 60 missions and now offers network multiplayer coop capabilities.

85396.name: Gore: Ultimate Soldier
85396.description:
User summary:

Mid 21st century. Powerful street gangs have taken control and have turned into ruin entire US cities. You play the role of the universal soldier. You use a highly advanced combat training simulator called Gore, which was created by the US government as a last ditch effort to regain control.

Your training however, will not be uneventful as the gangs hack into the simulator. In the death struggle that is sure to follow, the fate of the entire planet lays in your hands

Choose among unique and carefully balanced character classes. Use an arsenal of 30 hardcore weapons! Wear unparalleled pieces of armor! Pick up or blow up anything you find - weapons, ammo, stamina and health packs, all is up for grabs!

85397.name: Warhammer Fantasy Roleplay: Game Master's Guide
85397.description:
Publisher Blurb:

Craft your own grim and perilous adventures! The Game Master's Guide contains essential information for GMs wanting to run their own Warhammer Fantasy Roleplay campaigns. This hard-cover book features over 150 pages of compiled Game Master information from the Warhammer Fantasy Roleplay Core Set. From game rules to critical wounds, insanities, and miscasts, the Game Master's Guide features easy-to-reference charts and appendices. In addition to containing all the Core Set information, the Game Master's Guide also includes the rules for corruption and mutation from the Winds of Magic, as well as the rules for disease from Signs of Faith. If that weren't enough to get you started, the Game Master's Guide also comes with a complete introductory adventure, An Eye for an Eye.

rpgissuearticle.95471: Willkommen in der Alten Welt, Spielleiter

rpgpodcastepisode.64635: Episode 0 – Wilkommen und Was benötigt man zum Spielen?

85398.name: Vanquish
85398.description:
From the developer's website:

In a near-future world where Russia and the United States vie for ownership of the world’s fast-depleting energy resources, the US has constructed a space station in order to harness energy from the sun. Russian forces capture this space station and divert its harvested solar energy into a blast wave that destroys San Francisco, aiming to force the US into a total and unconditional surrender. In response, the US tasks its armed forces with recapturing the space station before the Russians can annihilate their next target - New York.

Directed by Shinji Mikami, the creator of the Resident Evil series, VANQUISH is a sci-fi shooter that sees players take the role of Sam, a government agent kitted out with a futuristic battle suit. A versatile fighter with a huge arsenal of weaponry at his disposal, Sam also has an array of martial arts skills that he can use to take down his robot enemies.

Fast, fluid and frenetic - this is gaming at its most explosive and exciting, as you storm into battle.

Experience a game character like no other - Sam is the ultimate weapon, donning a futuristic battle suit of destructive firepower and superhuman speed and agility.

Fight your way through the enormous, open environments of the space station. The most advanced, futuristic city in the skies becomes home to the action.

85399.name: Dead Nation
85399.description:
From the publisher's website:

Can you survive the zombie virus in this action-packed blaster from the developer of the popular Super Stardust HD?

- Pit your wits against hundreds of zombies on-screen.
- Blast your way with a friend in online and offline co-operative play and rank yourself with online leaderboards.
- Track your zombie kills with the daily online world map and reduce the zombie virus with other Dead Nation players in the country you're playing.

85400.name: Rune Factory: Tides of Destiny
85400.description:
Rune Factory Oceans is a Wii and PlayStation 3 role-playing developed by Neverland Co. and published by Marvelous Entertainment. Players control male and female characters named Azel and Sonia as they traverse the seas on a giant beast named Ymir. The beast can raise sunken islands and ships from the sea. Players will be able to farm, fight using a real-time battle system, and form relationships.

The PlayStation 3 version of the game supports the PlayStation Move motion controller and is the first instance of a Rune Factory title appearing on a Sony system.

Source: Wikipedia, "Rune Factory Oceans," available under the CC-BY-SA License.

85401.name: Catherine

videogamehonor.37499: 2011 Japan Game Awards Game of the Year Winner

85401.description:
The game will shift between action, during nightmares, and adventure scenes, during the daytime. Most of the adventure phase involves talking to acquaintances at the bar. During the action phases, Vincent is chased up giant staircases. If he falls from one he dies, resulting in a "game over."

The action mechanics in the game are apparently very deep, as the player will have to make choices in order to pass "stages". The game's producer, Katsura Hashino, explained that there are various ways to do this. There are three stages: Nightmare, Drama, and Stray Sheep.
