Written by E.N.World community member Fred Wolke (you might know him as Vaxalon, however), and fantastically illustrated by Hannah M.G. Shapero, this PDF details a single member of a magical medieval city council, Lord Visatto Remorga, with his full stats, background, relationships regarding the other council members, roleplaying hints and cronies.

Councilor Remorga also has a colour illustrated card designed to be shown to the players, with the character's notes on the back for the GM to refer to. Also included is a map of the palace grounds and first floor, along with descriptions of the grounds and a portion of the ground floor.

user comment
the cover is oriented to be normal Letter dimensions, but the "interior" is done landscape style (with the width being 11" vice the height).

85491.name: Psycho Killer
85491.description:
User Summary

It is a gloomy autumn day. As you are driving innocently up a hill, you suddenly see a car completely blocking the road up ahead, as it is stopped sideways. After desperately hitting the brakes, you witness....

The stage is set for what seems to be a tense, edge of your seat race against time. An unprecedented interactive movie in which you have to act in a speedy way and decide correctly in order to succeed.

rpgseries.8037: Metamorphosis: From Dretch to Demon Lord

85492.name: Death of a Demon Lord (Deluxe Edition)
85492.description:
From publisher blurb:

The first novel in the METAMORPHOSIS trilogy! The DELUXE EDITION - large size, full stats and game info for characters, critters, places and items, and beautiful artwork.

Death is only the beginning...

The wicked archmage Hazergal Redfist is dead, slain by the traitorous hand of his closest friend and confidant. The world rejoices as the tyrant mage's empire comes crumbling down, ending two centuries of brutal tyranny and war. But fate has only begun to weave the twisted skein of Hazergal's destiny, and as the light and warmth of life slip away, the former archmage finds himself on the bleak, demon-haunted planes of the Abyss, his soul condemned for all eternity.

Now a petitioner - the feeble soul shell from which all planar life is created - Hazergal is a shadow of his former self, seemingly bereft of the awesome power he commanded in life. Alone, defenseless, and beset by the fell inhabitants of the Abyss, Hazergal faces countless eons of torment and humiliation, his eternal reward for a lifetime of wickedness. But Hazergal soon realizes that he is different from the other abyssal petitioners. Memories of his former life remain, and in the deepest recesses of Hazergal's soul a terrible power grows, a power that will propel him along a course no mortal has ever undertaken, ultimately leading to the pinnacle of fiendish might.

But such power is a bright beacon of opportunity to the terrible abyssal rulers, and Hazergal soon finds himself embroiled in the lethal politics of the chaotic plane. Forced to emulate the demonic inhabitants of the Abyss in both body and mind, Hazergal must navigate a treacherous landscape of chaos and evil aided only by a curious rogue devil, and his own formidable intellect. And although destruction and damnation awaits him at every turn, the faint specter of ultimate power beckons Hazergal on, as he makes the arduous climb from dretch to demonlord.

85493.name: Bored of the Rings

videogamehonor.29172: 1985 Golden Joystick Best Adventure Game of the Year Nominee

85493.description:
User summary:

Loosely following the Lord of the Rings, Bored of the Rings is an interactive fiction game and a parody of Tolkien's saga. The names of characters and locations have been swapped for humorous counterparts.

In the three parts of the game, which can be accessed via passwords, the player can interact with characters by talking to them, and can also collect and make use of items mainly by various verb commands.

rpgseries.8037: Metamorphosis: From Dretch to Demon Lord

85494.name: The Tides of Chaos (Deluxe Edition)
85494.description:
From publisher blurb:

The second novel in the METAMORPHOSIS trilogy! The DELUXE EDITION - large size, full stats and game info for characters, critters, places and items, and beautiful artwork.

Dark forces gather…

Now a powerful demon in his own right, the former archmage Hazergal Redfist has become immersed in the brutal politics of the Abyss. With each fiendish transformation wrought upon his body, he gains more power, yet loses another vital piece of his humanity. Allied with the rogue devil Gemnez and an infamous abyssal ruler, Hazergal continues to unlock the mystery of his destiny and harness the awesome power slumbering within him.

But now an ancient evil has been released from an eons-long imprisonment, and the lower planes are threatened with a power of godlike proportions. The battle lines are drawn, and Hazergal, along with a number of unlikely allies, must thwart the machination of an enemy as old as the multiverse itself.

As the threat of a plane-spanning war looms, a specter from Hazergal’s past appears, and he must choose between his thirst for vengeance and the familiar trappings of the life he left behind.

85495.name: Metamorphosis: The Complete Journey

rpgseries.8037: Metamorphosis: From Dretch to Demon Lord

85495.description:
From publisher blurb:

The whole METAMORPHOSIS trilogy in one massive book - with game statistics for monsters, locations, NPCs and items!

Death is only the beginning.

The wicked archmage Hazergal Redfist is dead, slain by the traitorous hand of his closest friend and confidant. The world rejoices as the tyrant mageʼs empire comes crumbling down, ending two centuries of brutal tyranny and war. But fate has only begun to weave the twisted skein of Hazergalʼs destiny, and as the light and warmth of life slip away, the former archmage finds himself on the bleak, demon-haunted planes of the Abyss, his soul condemned for all eternity.

Now merely a shadow of his former self, Hazergal is seemingly bereft of the awesome power he commanded in life. Alone, defenseless, and beset by the fell inhabitants of the Abyss, Hazergal faces countless eons of torment and humiliation, his eternal reward for a lifetime of wickedness. But Hazergal soon realizes that he is different from the other Abyssal petitioners. Memories of his former life remain, and in the deepest recesses of Hazergalʼs soul a terrible power grows: a power that will propel him along a course no mortal has ever undertaken, leading to the pinnacle of fiendish might.

But such power is a bright beacon of opportunity to the terrible Abyssal rulers, and Hazergal soon finds himself embroiled in the lethal politics of the chaotic plane. Forced to emulate the demonic inhabitants of the Abyss in both body and mind, Hazergal must navigate a treacherous landscape of chaos and evil aided only by unlikely allies and his own formidable intellect. And although destruction and damnation awaits him at every turn, the faint specter of ultimate power beckons Hazergal on, as he makes the arduous climb from dretch to demon lord.

85496.name: Quest for the Holy Joystick
85496.description:
User summary:

This humorous adventure game satirizes the British adventure game scene of the early to mid 80's. As you wander around the various companies' offices and inside their games you will not help it but have some hearty laughs at the hilarious jokes. You will also be able to interact with various objects.

85498.name: The Kore Gang
85498.description:
The Story:

There are quirky creatures living deep inside the earth which would rarely catch the eye in an alien movie. These inner-earthians are really into sunlight, the blue skie altogether earth’s surface. That’s why they sally out to conquer earth’s upper world headed by the three freaked out KRANK brothers.
In a giant monster of seven kilometers height – the so-called Krank tank – they drill through the earth’s crust devastating Manhattan. This is just the start… Earth’s invasion has only just begun.

Of course mankind doesn’t just stand on the sidelines.

Fortunately, an invention by brilliant (yet pretty scatterbrained) inventor Dr. Samuelson is waiting to be used: the Kore Suit. By pure chance the three protagonists Pixie, Madboy and dog Rex got hold of the war robot. They enter it daringly to stop the invasion by the inner-earth creatures and, by the way, rescueing hijacked Dr. Samuelson. How does one destroy a metal giant like the Krank tank? Simply from the inside!

This is where you start your journey through THE KORE GANG.
If you expect the inside of the steel colossus to consist of dull engine rooms. You’re way off! To imitate earth’s sun-spoiled surface, the creatures from down below built some sort of earth inside the Krank tank. Sky, clouds, snow, rivers, meadows, scenic villages, weird buildings and trippy fabolous creatures all that and then some is waiting behind the massive steel skin.

This adventure is accordingly developing rich in variety for the heroes Pixie, Madboy and Rex. What’s after all the clou about this special weapon, the Kore suit? This brilliant combat suit intelligently adjusts to the respective user wearing it by increasing whose abilities. As Madboy, you’ll develop simply unbelievable physical powers and effectiveness against the creatures of the underworld. Pixie on the other hand is the athlete of the three. With her help you’ll move hand over hand along cliffs, cling to edges with gripper arms or you’ll hover across impassable terrain with shaking moves. You’re fastest with the dog Rex. He can also rely on his dog senses and smell and hear very well. This may you find very helpful in some of the puzzles.

You are in need of all the hero’s super abilities to be able to jump, climb, run, hover and fight your way through the fantastic world of THE KORE GANG and as well as to solve all the tricky puzzles.

The Features:

• An extraordinary beautiful and entertaining story as well as one of the most spaced out visual styles ever seen on Wii so far
• More than one hour of hollywood-style cutscenes and sounds
• Countless humorous ideas and many funny details
• Innovative gameplay taylored to Wii, fully support of all advantages of Wiimote and Nunchuck
• More than 30 diverse levels in 6 unique, phantastic worlds
• Made for hardcore gamers as well as for casual gamers and newbies (increasing level of difficulty)
• Dozens of complete customized, freaking enemies and challenging boss fights
• Likeable heroes, which delight and will be loved by everyone
• Perfect synchronization with known English speakers

Source: The Game Website.

85499.name: Halls of Montezuma: A Battle History of the United States Marine Corps

videogamehonor.22404: 1987 Charles S. Roberts Best Twentieth Century Computer Wargame Nominee

85499.description:
From the Australian C-64 box back:

FROM THE HALLS OF MONTEZUMA
TO THE SHORES OF TRIPOLI
WE WILL FIGHT OUR COUNTRY'S BATTLES
ON THE LAND AND ON THE SEA

MEXICO CITY BELLEAU WOOD IWO JIMA
OKINAWA-THE SHURI LINE OKINAWA-THE FINAL REDOUBT
PUSAN INCHON HUE

From the capture of Mexico City in 1848 through two World Wars, Korea and Vietnam, the United States Marine Corps has a combat record secdon to none.

Now it's your turn...

In only ten minutes you can be using the enhanced Battlefront Game System to meet the challenge of commanding the men of the USMC.

To give you even more authority on the computer battlefield, Halls of Montezuma includes a comprehensive wargame construction set, WARPLAN, and a complete graphics editor, WARPAINT.

WARPLAN allows you to create endless variations to the historical scenarios as well as designing your own original battles.

WARPAINT gives you complete graphic control over the icon and terrain symbols used in the game. Shapes and colors can be changed at will to produce your own special effects.
